txt.en: Rochwen is encamped near the Last Bridge in the South Trollshaws, far to the south of Thoroniel's camp in the North Trollshaws.\n\nThoroniel bade you carry a report of your campaign against the spiders of the North Trollshaws back to Rochwen.

'You should return now to Rochwen at the Last Bridge. Bring her a report of our endeavours here...she will want to know what has happened. She is likely still encamped with Alphlanc at the Last Bridge in the South Trollshaws, far to the south of here.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder], and may the stars light your path.'
'It is as we feared...the evil of the Enemy is summoning all dark things to its banner.\n\n'Thank you for your aid, [placeholder]. I will send word to Master Elrond.'
The Trapdoor and Flesh-gnawer spiders of the North Trollshaws suffered a terrible defeat at your hands.
